apps/desktop/src/hooks/useFileUpload.ts.description: useFileUpload hook for file uploads with react-dropzone. Supports images (PNG, JPEG, GIF, WebP) and PDFs up to 25MB. Converts files to base64 ChatAttachment format. Provides getRootProps/getInputProps for dropzone, isDragActive, openFilePicker, removeAttachment, and clearAttachments.

apps/desktop/src/assistant/image-utils.t.description: Image utilities for Vision API. Key functions: imageToBase64(File) → data URL, prepareImageForVisionApi(data) → Vision API format, resizeImage(File, maxDim) → smaller data URL, extractBase64Data/extractMimeType for parsing data URLs. All outputs use the format data:image/{format};base64,{data}.

apps/desktop/src/workspace/views/assista.description: Image analysis integration in chat flow. The send() function detects image attachments via currentAttachments.filter(att => att.type === 'image'), calls analyzeImage() from image-analysis.ts with auto type detection, and formats response using getAnalysisSummary() and formatClarifyingQuestions(). Confidence is displayed with emoji (✅ high, ⚠️ medium, ❓ low) and percentage.
